_header: Our Kings banners beth forth I-bore
Subjects: translations; Christ, hymns to; hymns, to Christ
_description: One quatrain, translating the first stanza of Vexilla regis prodeunt

CULKk424.Transcription:
Ower kynges baneres byth foorþe y-borenow schynes þe
                    crouches þat raþer was pryueewher þe maker of man þat
                    was for-lorenow hangeth on þe rood tree
